keyMoments.title: Robin Defeats Hammond
keyMoments.description: Nico Robin defeats Hammond using Doble Clutch, freeing enslaved humans and shifting battle momentum.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's combat effectiveness in the Fish-Man Island battle.

keyMoments.title: Officially Backed by Neptune Army
keyMoments.description: The Neptune Army officially decides to support the Straw Hats in battle at Gyoncorde Plaza.
keyMoments.significance: Government forces officially ally with the Straw Hats, recognizing them as allies rather than threats.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Crew's True Nature Exposed
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi broadcasts that Hody and the New Fish-Man Pirates are empty beings perpetuating baseless hatred, with Hody admitting 'Nothing' was done to him by humans.
keyMoments.significance: The ideological foundation of the crew is exposed as hollow and based on inherited prejudice rather than genuine grievances.

keyMoments.title: Hammond Defeated, Slaves Freed
keyMoments.description: Hammond is defeated by Robin and his slave tank is destroyed, freeing enslaved humans who then fight against the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Major loss for the crew as their captives become enemies.

keyMoments.title: Neptune Army Officially Joins the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Minister of the Right and Neptune Army arrive at Gyoncorde Plaza and officially decide to back up the Straw Hat Pirates, acknowledging their previous errors in judgment.
keyMoments.significance: Represents a major shift in the kingdom's relationship with the Straw Hats from suspicion to alliance.
